meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Robin Dan Meg Shreve Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #657.

td.p: Meg Shreve, an attorney from Bolinas, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $19,800)

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):
Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_1', 'clue_DJ_1_1_stuck', 'stripes on the flag

Meg
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_1_1', 'clue_DJ_1_1_stuck', 'In 1818, Congress ordered these cut back from 15 to 13, and they\'ve stayed that way since')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 1818, Congress ordered these cut back from 15 to 13, and they've stayed that way since

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
MegWhat are Australia & South America?
$4,999
RobinWhat are Australia & North America?
$5,200
DanWhat are Australia & N. America?
$5,000
Australia & South America')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Besides Antarctica, the other 2 continents that have no communist countries')

tr.td: Besides Antarctica, the other 2 continents that have no communist countries
2nd place: trip on Eastern to Caribbean & stay at Hedonism II Resort

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
